results.description: Read the 12 takeaways from this weekend's Scottish Premiership action.
results.title: Scottish Premiership: What did we learn from the weekend's games?

results.description: Goals from Joe Aribo and Alfredo Morelos give Rangers victory over Livingston to keep them level on points with leaders Celtic. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Livingston 0-2 Rangers

results.description: Steven Gerrard feels Livingston head coach Gary Holt was wide of the mark with criticism of him after the Rangers boss called for better protection for players.
results.title: Livingston 0-2 Rangers: Steven Gerrard questions Gary Holt's pre-match remarks

results.description: Rangers remain level on points with Celtic at the top of the Scottish Premiership after beating Livingston at the Tony Macaroni Arena.
results.shortTitle: Rangers beat Livi to stay level at top
results.title: Livingston 0-2 Rangers: Steven Gerrard's side remain level at top of table

results.description: Shorn of some his best talent, Livingston boss Gary Holt faced a summer rebuild to keep the club in the Scottish Premiership. The numbers suggest he is doing a fine job.
results.shortTitle: Can Livingston continue to punch above their weight?
results.title: Livingston: Can Gary Holt keep all-action club punching above its weight?

results.description: Catch up with all the team news and stats for the six games taking place before the international break, and choose your preferred XI.
results.title: Scottish Premiership team news, stats & selectors

results.description: Livingston midfielder Marvin Bartley says he "did not recognise" former club Hibernian in the first half of last week's 2-2 draw at Easter Road.
results.shortTitle: 'It wasn't a Hibs team I recognised'
results.title: 'It wasn't a Hibs team I recognised' - Marvin Bartley on plight of former club

thumbnail.altText: Livingston midfielder Marvin Bartley left Hibs in the summer

results.description: Livingston sign left-back Aaron Taylor-Sinclair on a short-term deal after allowing Ibrahima Savane to return to France.
results.title: Livingston: Aaron Taylor-Sinclair signs as Ibrahima Savane leaves

results.description: A late strike from Allan Campbell keeps Motherwell in third place as they beat Livingston at Fir Park. (UK only|)
results.title: Highlights: Motherwell 2-1 Livingston

results.description: Motherwell hold on to third place in the Scottish Premiership with a hard-fought 2-1 victory over Livingston.
results.shortTitle: Motherwell beat Livi to stay third
results.title: Motherwell 2-1 Livingston: Stephen Robinson's side stay third in Premiership

results.description: BBC Sportscene pundit Michael Stewart suggests there is no contact from Livingston's Marvin Bartley as Scott Allan wins a penalty for Hibernian. (UK only)
results.shortTitle: 'There is no contact - it's not a penalty kick'
results.title: Livingston 2-2 Hibernian: 'There is no contact - it's not a penalty kick'

thumbnail.altText: Hibs' Scott Allan wins a penalty against Livingston

results.description: Substitute Martin Boyle scores in stoppage time to prevent Hibs slipping bottom of the league as the struggling hosts hit back from 2-0 at home to Livingston.
results.title: Highlights: Hibernian 2-2 Livingston

results.description: Martin Boyle scores in stoppage-time on his comeback from injury as Hibernian salvage an unlikely point against Livingston at Easter Road.
results.title: Hibs 2-2 Livingston: Martin Boyle nets late leveller on comeback

results.description: BBC Scotland looks at the reasons behind Hearts' and Hibernian's poor starts to the Scottish Premiership campaign.
results.shortTitle: What's happened to Hearts and Hibs?
results.title: Scottish Premiership: What's behind Hearts' and Hibs' poor start in the league?

results.description: BBC pundits Michael Stewart and Steven Thompson think Livingston should have had a penalty in their draw with Hearts - but disagree on their red card. (UK only)
results.shortTitle: 'It's a penalty - and a red card'
results.title: Watch: Livingston 0-0 Hearts - BBC pundits say hosts should have had penalty

results.description: Livingston and Heart of Midlothian draw a blank, leaving Craig Levein's side just one point off the foot of the Premiership. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Livingston 0-0 Heart of Midlothian

results.description: Hearts sit just one point off the foot of the Scottish Premiership table after being held by 10-man Livingston.
results.shortTitle: Hearts a point off bottom after Livi draw
results.title: Livingston 0-0 Heart of Midlothian: Hearts frustrated by 10-man hosts

results.description: Craig Levein's Hearts side had won nine of their opening 18 Scottish Premiership games prior to a surprising and demoralising 5-0 defeat to Livingston last season.
results.shortTitle: Watch: When Livingston brought Hearts' season to a halt
results.title: When Livingston brought Hearts' season to a halt with a surprise 5-0 victory

thumbnail.altText: When Livingston brought Hearts' season to a halt
